fields.name: IconTile_tiles
fields.value: [{"text":" 示例磁贴一 ","cols":"1","bgColor":"#9b59b6","icon":"__dirname/img/credit31_white.png"},{"text":" 示例磁贴二 ","cols":"1","bgColor":"#f38433","icon":"__dirname/img/businessman1_white.png"}]

dblink.onDelete: function onDelete(pageStoreStr,ids){ids+='';var id,list,listStore,idList=ids.split(','),pageStore=JSON.parse(pageStoreStr);pageStore.fields.some(function(item){if(item.name=='IconTile_tiles'){listStore=item;list=JSON.parse(item.value);return true}});if(!(typeof list=='object'&&list.forEach)){return pageStoreStr}var newList=[];list.forEach(function(item,index){var cid=''+item.cat;if(idList.indexOf(cid)==-1)newList.push(item)});listStore.value=JSON.stringify(newList);return JSON.stringify(pageStore)}
